node.title: Part 3 - The Church of Acts
node.description: Rather than merely a branch of labor for a handful of specially-gifted church members, Personal Ministries is a heaven-born initiative representing God’s ideal for all His people. In this seminar series, we’ll discover the biblical foundations of Personal Ministries and give practical instruction for how you can help transform your local church into the soul-winning organization the Lord intends it to be.
